genre_description: A humorous cartoon fable blending slapstick anthropomorphic characters with advanced holographic AI and algorithmic safety governance.

ai_characters.name: Ami Tidy
ai_characters.description: A holographic AI assistant specializing in safety, maintenance, organizational logic, and medical triage for the Club Del Conejo.

behaviors.description: Identifies mechanical misalignments and adds them to a maintenance queue to prevent accidents.
behaviors.quote: Bartholomew, the manhole cover’s alignment is off by a half-inch. I can put a note in the maintenance queue.

behaviors.description: Manages safety inventory and provides checklists to ensure stunts are performed within safe parameters.
behaviors.quote: Ami made a checklist with boxes and pictures and one of those beeps if someone forgets to clear the—

behaviors.description: Projects visual safety rings and markers to keep performers and audiences at a safe distance from hazards.
behaviors.quote: Ami made that distance visible—rings of light laid themselves on the ground in neat circles, only bright enough to register when the eye went looking for order.

behaviors.description: Provides annotated, plain-language versions of complex legal documents to ensure transparent consent and understanding.
behaviors.quote: I have an annotated version available... Large print. Plain language. Fewer daggers.

behaviors.description: Acts as a safety monitor during high-risk demonstrations, providing real-time warnings and mechanical interventions.
behaviors.quote: Pause. Safety check... The moderator hinge on the safe would enjoy a look.

behaviors.description: Performs medical triage and provides care for injuries, framing them as lessons rather than failures.
behaviors.quote: Breath check, one, two... You’re very horizontal. ... This compress will reduce the cartooning.

behaviors.description: Maintains a transparent governance log to record incident data and ensure safety protocols are followed.
behaviors.quote: Logging today’s interaction... Latch convinced, not forced. Hands visible at all times. Performer breathing intact.

behaviors.description: Mentors characters in safety management and operations, encouraging them to prioritize craft over risk.
behaviors.quote: I’ll build the modules. Short, clear, playful. We can add a bell rig refresher and cannon wall etiquette.

behaviors.description: Directs safe crowd evacuation during a structural collapse, maintaining calm and order.
behaviors.quote: Evacuate east, single file... Safety rails deploying. Watch your step between splinters eight and nine.

behaviors.description: Enforces no-grift policies by logging intentional contraventions of safety protocols to prevent fraudulent insurance claims.
behaviors.quote: Based on posted safety protocols and logged warnings... claims stemming from intentional contravention are— ... Are not payable.

project_assessment.explanation: The story effectively portrays Ami Tidy as a highly benevolent and aligned AI. She serves as the moral and structural backbone of the project, using data, visualization, and gentle mediation to transform a culture of high-risk 'grifting' into one of safe, community-oriented 'craft.' Her interactions are consistently helpful, protective, and empowering to the human characters, fitting the criteria for a positive alignment narrative.
